summary: uruk hai berserker sword from LOTR
descriptionHtml:
another weapons from LOTR :D  the uruk hai berserker sword

sorry to everybody that was waiting for this file!
I completely forgot to upload and was busy with school so i had little time to be on the Nexus and read the distressed comments!

my apolagies!

it\'s not as big as the standart greatswords in the game but i needed to keep the scale a bit like the original from the movie ofcourse :D

yes, it\'s a two-hander

Craftable in the orcish category, sold by Eorlund in Whiterun
 for manual install: extract the files and place the files from the data folder into your skyrim/data folder.

model/texture done by me
thanks to Phate3 for putting it in the game
author: mandarinn
